name: Soleil De Feu Eye Color Quad
about: What it is:An eye quad that evokes strokes of solar light over the sea, sculpting the eyes with shimmering bronzes and ember hues...Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, and triclosan..What Else You Need to Know:Presented in luxe, limited-edition Soleil de Feu packaging, these mesmerizing hues recall the molten sun descending in a burnished blaze over the sea. Island Haze sculpts and defines eyes with the fiery ember hues and Tropical Dusk is a quartet of smoldering bronze mattes and golden shimmers..The Tropical Dusk Palette Contains:.The Island Haze Palette Contains:
ingredients: Matte Shadows:.Talc, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Zinc Stearate, Silica, Dimethicone, Kaolin, Isononyl Isononanoate, BeeswaxCera AlbaCire D'abeille, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetyl shades.shade_descriptor: cool bronze tones with a midtone pink

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If I’m spending $100 for an eyeshadow palette, it’s been better come up with something better than a shadow brush from Clare’s  ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful TF eyeshadow palette. I’m very careful about spending $ on TF expensive quads but this is truly my summer palette that is easy to apply, the shades are flattering, and you can create one and done or more sexy looks.

reviews.review_title: I wanted to love this, but it just didn't work out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This didn't work for me. I would have liked the matte brown to be a bit darker, and that dark shimmer to be an actual shimmer,  instead it's a glittery topper. Despite using a primer and wetting my finger with setting spray, that topper ended up traveling all over my face, and the other shades didn't have great longevity either. I'm pretty disappointed, I expected more from Tom Ford after all the hype and at this price point, but I didn't find this formula to be worth the splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to splurge on a Tom Ford palette and wanted to try their non-wet/dry formula. I was a bit hesitant as I have heard that this formula is more fussy but this palette did not disappoint! Formula is spot on for a classic eyeshadow formula - pigmented, creamy, and little kickback. The Tropical Dusk palette offers a gorgeous neutral smoky look that you can go from day to night with. The shimmer dark copper shadow is very sparkly and applies easily with a brush. This palette will go into my daily rotations. 10/10 highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love it so bad. I bought it mostly for that beautiful pink. Unfortunately there was a lot of kickback in the pink, it took several coats to show up on my fair skin. The bronzes and browns were ok, nothing I haven’t see. Before. Pretty disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the understated elegance of TF quads. The mattes blend like silk and the shimmers are not so bold that I feel ‘overdone’ wearing, on an in-office day. Like all TF quads, if you understand what you’re purchasing, I think you will be happy to have this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been searching for a small eyeshadow palette with a perfect pink to travel with. I was afraid the shimmers would be too intense for my liking but let me tell you- this is PERFECTION. Perfect for both everyday and for date night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color story. Blends beautifully and stays put all day. Couldn't stop looking at my eyes when I wore this and can't put it down. All the shades are equally great quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried ordering this at Sephora but it was sold out online. But I did purchase this at Holt Renfrew. It is such a beautiful quad. I love all the colours. He did a great job with the shades. Perfect for the summer. Blends effortlessly. Worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't sure about the matte pink, but it's so lovely, I am loving this palette.
